sentence.Network_en: The work demanded boundless energy and theatrical imagination.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种工作需要具备无限的精力和夸张的想象力。

sentence.Network_en: Derricks are scattered here and there on the boundless plain.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一望无际的原野上散布着一座座井架.

entry.def: If you describe something as boundless, you mean that there seems to be no end or limit to it.

example.ex: The work demanded boundless energy and theatrical imagination...
example.tran: 这种工作需要具备无限的精力和夸张的想象力。

means.word_mean: 1. seemingly boundless in amount, number, degree, or especially extent;

auth_sentence.content: The material world appears to be...boundless and immense.
auth_sentence.res_content: The material world appears to be...boundless and immense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The material world appears to be...boundless and immense.

auth_sentence.content: The player felt he had boundless energy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The player felt he had boundless energy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The player felt he had boundless energy.

auth_sentence.content: Bloomfield's enthusiasm is as boundless as her interests are narrow.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bloomfield's enthusiasm is as boundless as her interests are narrow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bloomfield's enthusiasm is as boundless as her interests are narrow.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fault犯错误,欺骗+less无……的,不……的→adj.无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
feck价值,效果+less无……的,不……的→adj.无目标无计划的
flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+less无……的,不……的→adj.没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
nerve神经,胆量,勇气+less无……的,不……的→adj.无力的,无勇气的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rest休息,静止+less无……的,不……的→adj.得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sense感觉+less无……的,不……的→adj.不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
spine脊骨,书脊+less无……的,不……的→没骨气的
tire疲劳,劳累+less无……的,不……的→adj.不疲劳的
value价值+less无……的,不……的→adj.不足道的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的

sentences.cn: 她那使不完的精力令我羨慕。

sentences.en: He is a man of apparently boundless optimism.
sentences.cn: 他显然是一个极度乐观的人。

sentences.en: An individual is only a tiny grain in the vast sea;it is the masses of people that are the boundless ocean.
sentences.cn: 个人只是沧海的一粟,人民群众才是无垠的大海。
